title: Odion Ighalo - Transfer history | Transfermarkt
snippet: Odion Ighalo is a 36-year old football player aus Nigeria, (* Jun 16, 1989 in Lagos, Nigeria). Ighalo is Jul 1, 2025 without a club since. He plays in the position Centre-Forward. His market value is €800k.
